channel.title: Show-Debug on PetterTech
channel.description: Recent content in Show-Debug on PetterTech

item.title: Powershell function for showing some system information
item.description: This is a function I created just because I wanted to toy around with Powershell and get-wmiobject. Also, this is my first function where I made it possible to use a switch parameter. What the function does is gather some system information using get-wmiobject. The info is written to a temp file and then shown using out-gridview. If the KeepTempFile parameter is used the temp file is saved in the users profile, if not it is deleted after the function finishes.
